author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Varonis Systems Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.53
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Varonis Systems Inc:
* VARONIS ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.07
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01 TO $0.07
* Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.22
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.53 * Q1 REVENUE $53.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $49.7 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE UP 24 TO 26 PERCENT * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.31 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $262.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05, REVENUE VIEW $61.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
